summary: This is esp changes to Cloth Immersive Edition Progression Overhaul. Various changes to keywords, recipes, removed containers/keys, misc changes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#9fc5e8]This mod is a small esp bundle of fixes for the mod [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75809/?]Cloth Immersive Edition Armor Progression Overhaul[/url][color=#9fc5e8].
You will need to install version 1.3 of that mod and then pick [/color][color=#ff0000]ONE[/color][color=#9fc5e8] of these fixed files.
Be sure you pick [/color][color=#ff0000]ONLY ONE![/color][color=#9fc5e8] Override when prompted.Â 
[/color][color=#a4c2f4]As always with my fixes/changes, please endorse the original mod and not this one.[/color]

[b][u]Why make this?:[/u][/b]
[color=#9fc5e8]The cloth immersive edition mod is one of my favourites, but the author left some things out of place so I cleaned it up.[/color]

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75809/?]Cloth Immersive Edition Armor Progression Overhaul[/url] [color=#ff0000]V 1.3 (please be sure it's 1.3)[/color]

[b][u]Changes to V1:[/u][/b]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Keywords changed to better suit cloth --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Prices adjusted --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Lily torso is now properly made cloth --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- All containers and keys have been removed --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Removed all lingering records not used for armors --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Gloves and boots should now be able to be enchanted. [/color][color=#ff0000]If you have issues with this let me know.[/color][color=#9fc5e8] --[/color]

[b][u]Changes to V2:[/u][/b]
[color=#9fc5e8]Everything that V1 has but with recipes changes.[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Removed gold requirement to craft armors --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Removed potion requirement to craft armors --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Changed recipes to better suit the item being made (i.e. leather and wolf pelt for boots with fur) --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Changed recipes to reflect dye required for the garments --[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]-- Items now properly take linen and no longer require cotton as their cloth source --[/color]

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
[color=#9fc5e8]CIEAPO - cp44[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]The Lily - pottoply[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]Battlemage Armor - Elianora[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]Scarlet Dawn - jmenaru[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]Sadistic Magician - AmeeraGirl[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]Yennefer DLC - zzjay[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]Raven Witch - Zerofrost[/color][/center]
author: Ero
